verses.verse: He that <S%H3427>dwelleth<s%> in the <S%H5643>secret<s%> place of the most <S%H5945>High<s%> shall <S%H3885>abide<s%> under the <S%H6738>shadow<s%> of the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%>. abide: Heb. lodge
I will <S%H559>say<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, He is my <S%H4268>refuge<s%> and my <S%H4686>fortress<s%>: my <S%H430>God<s%>; in him will I <S%H982>trust<s%>.
Surely he shall <S%H5337>deliver<s%> thee from the <S%H6341>snare<s%> of the <S%H3353>fowler<s%>, and from the <S%H1942>noisome<s%> <S%H1698>pestilence<s%>.

He shall <S%H5526>cover<s%> thee with his <S%H84>feathers<s%>, and under his <S%H3671>wings<s%> shalt thou <S%H2620>trust<s%>: his <S%H571>truth<s%> shall be thy <S%H6793>shield<s%> and <S%H5507>buckler<s%>.
Thou shalt not be <S%H3372>afraid<s%> for the <S%H6343>terror<s%> by <S%H3915>night<s%>; nor for the <S%H2671>arrow<s%> that <S%H5774>flieth<s%> by <S%H3119>day<s%>;
Nor for the <S%H1698>pestilence<s%> that <S%H1980>walketh<s%> in <S%H652>darkness<s%>; nor for the <S%H6986>destruction<s%> that <S%H7736>wasteth<s%> at <S%H6672>noonday<s%>.
A <S%H505>thousand<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> at thy <S%H6654>side<s%>, and ten <S%H7233>thousand<s%> at thy right <S%H3225>hand<s%>; but it shall not come <S%H5066>nigh<s%> thee.
Only with thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> shalt thou <S%H5027>behold<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H8011>reward<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>.
Because thou hast <S%H7760>made<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, which is my <S%H4268>refuge<s%>, even the most <S%H5945>High<s%>, thy <S%H4583>habitation<s%>;
There shall no <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H579>befall<s%> thee, neither shall any <S%H5061>plague<s%> come <S%H7126>nigh<s%> thy <S%H168>dwelling<s%>.
For he shall give his <S%H4397>angels<s%> <S%H6680>charge<s%> over thee, to <S%H8104>keep<s%> thee in all thy <S%H1870>ways<s%>.
They shall bear thee <S%H5375>up<s%> in their <S%H3709>hands<s%>, lest thou <S%H5062>dash<s%> thy <S%H7272>foot<s%> against a <S%H68>stone<s%>.
Thou shalt <S%H1869>tread<s%> upon the <S%H7826>lion<s%> and <S%H6620>adder<s%>: the young <S%H3715>lion<s%> and the <S%H8577>dragon<s%> shalt thou trample under <S%H7429>feet<s%>. adder: or, asp
Because he hath set his <S%H2836>love<s%> upon me, therefore will I <S%H6403>deliver<s%> him: I will set him on <S%H7682>high<s%>, because he hath <S%H3045>known<s%> my <S%H8034>name<s%>.
He shall <S%H7121>call<s%> upon me, and I will <S%H6030>answer<s%> him: I will be with him in <S%H6869>trouble<s%>; I will <S%H2502>deliver<s%> him, and <S%H3513>honour<s%> him.
With <S%H753>long<s%> <S%H3117>life<s%> will I <S%H7646>satisfy<s%> him, and <S%H7200>shew<s%> him my <S%H3444>salvation<s%>. long: Heb. length of days
